Welcome to SmartPlastic's documentation!
========================================

SmartPlastic_ aims to make the world a better place.

Below are some useful links to help you get started with uploading and managing content, contributing and errors.

**Uploading content**
    * How do I upload an article?

**Managing content (that is already uloaded)**
    * Deactivating articles

**Handling errors**
    * Different error messages and how to avoid errors

**Contributing**
    * Translate SmartPlastic!
    * Commit to the code

**Further links**
    * `Official Website <https://www.smartplastic.eu/>`__
    * `WebApp Interface <https://interface.smartplastic.eu/>`__
    * `GitHub repo for everything but the documentation <https://github.com/FloHauser/SmartPlasticDjango/>`__
    * `GitHub repo just for the documentation <https://github.com/SmartPlastic/SmartPlasticDocs>`__
    *Note:* You may not be able to access the second but last link, as the project is on private status duo to security reasons at the moment. We are working on a fix.

.. _SmartPlastic: https://smartplastic.eu
